member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the the sender profile is configured correctly.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Notifications.INotificationService.GetSubscriber(Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Notifications.ServiceContext,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the subscriber. Returns null if it cannot be found.
member.param: The context of the application which invokes the method.
Unique identifier in the bounds of the specified context. The resolveKey is designed to be used for handling the synchronization with external modules or systems.
member.returns: Returns the subscriber with the given resolve key or null if there is no such for the given filters.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Notifications.INotificationService.GetSentSubscribers(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets the resolve keys of subscribers of a specific notification job, to which messages had been successfully sent. Used, for example, by external invokers of the notification service (e.g. the NewslettersManager) in order to keep track of the subscribers, by their resolve-keys. This method can safely return data only while the job is executing. Once the job is done, it may be removed with all its subscription records.
member.returns: An IEnumerable collection of the resolve keys of subscribers of the specific notification job, to which delivery was successful.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Notifications.INotificationService.GetUnsuccessfulSubscribers(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets the resolve keys of subscribers of a specific notification job, to which messages had failed to send. Used, for example, by external invokers of the notification service (e.g. the NewslettersManager) in order to retrieve statistics of failed deliveries, by their resolve-keys. This method can safely return data while the job is running or after it's complete, as the failed deliveries are persisted.
member.returns: IEnumerable collection of the resolve keys of subscribers of the specific notification job, to which delivery was unsuccessful.

member.summary: The message job has failed.

member.summary: The message job is still initializing and not ready to run yet.

member.name: F:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Notifications.MessageJobStatus.New
